report.title: Nutmeg Not Worth It
report.author: Tryp
report.bodytext: I had haerd about the pschoactive effects of nutmeg and decided to try it out. I'd previously tried smoking and drinking a tea from it with no effect so decided to try eating it. This is what happened. /n /n 7am - 20g of whole nutmeg ground into powder and drunk with OJ /n /n 8am - feeling nausious, and decided to go back to sleep. /n /n 4pm - woke up feeling sick and a little dizzy /n /n 4:30 - a lot more dizzy, alot more sick and threw up /n /n 5pm - a little less sick and extremely dizzy, slight visual distortions, same for next hour /n /n 6pm - pass out on bed /n /n 11:30 next morning - woke up, still feeling quite dizzy but not sick /n /n 1pm - effects wearing off /n /n 3pm - back to baseline /n /n Overall I must say I did not enjoy the experience, will not try it again, and do not reccommend any one else trys it.
